name: nbinteract
description: Export interactive HTML pages from Jupyter Notebooks for J1 Template

scripts.build:py: npm run clean:py && python setup.py bdist_wheel
scripts.clean:start: echo Clean up project root files ..
scripts.clean:py: shx rm -rf dist && shx rm -rf build && shx rm -rf nbinteract.egg-info
scripts.clean:packages: echo Clean up project packages .. && lerna run --parallel clean
scripts.install--local: echo Install nbinteract locally .. && pip install -e . 2>&1 > install--local.log && echo done.
scripts.reset:start: echo Reset development system to factory state ..
scripts.reset:clean: echo Remove js modules from all packages .. && lerna clean --yes
scripts.setup: npm --silent run setup-start && npm --silent run setup-base-nodejs && run-s -s setup:*
scripts.setup-start: echo Set up development system for first use ..
scripts.setup-base-nodejs: echo Bootstrap NodeJS base modules .. && echo J1 Project Base modules: > install.log && npm install --silent rimraf shx npm-run-all cross-var cross-env >> install.log && echo done.
scripts.setup-base:py: echo Bootstrap Python base modules .. && python -m pip install twine && echo done.
scripts.setup:node-modules: echo Bootstrap NodeJS project modules .. && echo J1 Project modules: >> install.log && npm install --silent >> install.log && echo done.
scripts.setup:lerna: echo Initialize NodeJS modules for all development packages .. && lerna init && lerna bootstrap && echo done.
